ABOUT

I’m a kiwi , living in England

I have a Diploma of Web Design and Deveopment from Vision College, and for the past year I’ve been living the dream, designing, building and maintaining websites for the UK’s largest independent automotive agency

Some technologies I’ve used:

  • HTML & CSS
  • SCSS / SASS
  • Bootstrap 3 & 4
  • PHP
  • MySQL
  • Gulp
  • Javascript
  • JQuery
  • Photoshop

For the past couple of months I've been focusing on learning ReactJS

OlyLifts.co

Olylifts is a simple javascript calculator, designed to estimate and compare a users olympic weightlifting lifts based on their back squat. Olylifts has been featured on AllThingsGym.com, and has around 2000 visitors per month!

  • SCSS / SASS
  • Javascript
  • JQuery
VISIT SITE VIEW CODE

Mortgage Calculator

A ReactJS based mortgage calculator, using local storage to keep state on the same device.

A pseudo ecommerce and portfolio site for a talented New Zealand artist. Built with PHP, this site has a CMS and admin dashboard built from scratch.
